meta.name: description
meta.content: City of Baker School District serves K-12th grade students and is located in Baker, LA.

header.h2: CBSS Continous Learning Technology Survey For Parents

div.p: Parents, please take a minute to complete this brief survey. We need your input as soon as possible. Thanks!

div.div: Welcome to The City of Baker School District
The City of Baker School System shall provide a quality education for all students…empowering excellence.

h3.a: City of Baker School System… There’s an app for that!

div.div: That’s right, you can now keep up with all of the who, what, when and where for City of Baker School System through the City of Baker School System app by SchoolInfoApp - available on all mobile devices!

img.alt: Help Raise Money For Our Schools Featured Photo

h3.a: Help Raise Money For Our Schools

div.div: With every debit card purchase you make through Mascot Checking, Neighbors FCU makes a monetary donation to the participating school of your choice.
